column2:
"Hmm, everyone seems really tense. They must be excited about the upcoming event!
Oh, it's just exhaustion, is it...?"
"In that case, since you've all been working so hard, I want to make this event one that'll get all of you back on your feet!"
"Step one, I want you to go and take care of the guys who're tiring everyone out in the first place."
"And if you come up with any ideas for how to heal people's fatigue while you're out there, please let me know!"
